targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', timestamp) as time,
  CASE
    WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 100.0
    ELSE GREATEST(0.0, 100.0 - (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE is_anomaly = 1) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)))
  END as health_score
FROM ml_predictions
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND namespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'kube-public', 'kube-node-lease', 'local-path-storage')
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', timestamp) as time,
  100.0 as health_score
FROM pod_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND namespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'kube-public', 'kube-node-lease', 'local-path-storage')
  AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ml_predictions mp WHERE $__timeFilter(mp.timestamp) AND mp.namespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'kube-public', 'kube-node-lease', 'local-path-storage'))
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  COALESCE(anomaly_type, 'unknown') as anomaly_type,
  COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as count
FROM ml_predictions
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND is_anomaly = 1
  
GROUP BY anomaly_type
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', timestamp) as time,
  COALESCE(AVG(COALESCE(cpu_utilization, 0)), 0.0) as "CPU Usage",
  COALESCE(AVG(COALESCE(memory_utilization, 0)), 0.0) as "Memory Usage"
FROM pod_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND namespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'kube-public', 'kube-node-lease', 'local-path-storage')
  AND (cpu_utilization IS NOT NULL OR memory_utilization IS NOT NULL OR cpu_usage_millicores >= 0 OR memory_usage_bytes >= 0 OR cpu_limit_millicores >= 0 OR memory_limit_bytes >= 0)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  mp.timestamp,
  mp.pod_name,
  mp.namespace,
  COALESCE(mp.anomaly_type, 'unknown') as anomaly_type,
  mp.confidence,
  CASE WHEN r.id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as remediated
FROM ml_predictions mp
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT id
  FROM remediations r
  WHERE r.pod_name = mp.pod_name
    AND r.namespace = mp.namespace
    AND r.executed_at > mp.timestamp
    AND r.success = true
  ORDER BY r.executed_at ASC
  LIMIT 1
) r ON true
WHERE $__timeFilter(mp.timestamp) AND namespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'kube-public', 'kube-node-lease', 'local-path-storage')
  AND mp.is_anomaly = 1
  AND mp.namespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'kube-public', 'kube-node-lease', 'local-path-storage')
ORDER BY mp.timestamp DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', executed_at) as time,
  CASE
    WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0.0
    ELSE COALESCE((COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE success = true) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)), 0.0)
  END as success_rate
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', timestamp) as time,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE is_anomaly = 1) as "Anomalies Detected"
FROM ml_predictions
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as value FROM early_warnings WHERE (expires_at IS NULL OR expires_at > NOW()) AND (acknowledged IS NULL OR acknowledged = FALSE)

SELECT time_bucket('1 minute', created_at) as time, severity, COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as value FROM early_warnings WHERE (expires_at IS NULL OR expires_at > NOW()) AND (acknowledged IS NULL OR acknowledged = FALSE) AND $__timeFilter(created_at) GROUP BY time, severity ORDER BY time

SELECT pod_name, namespace, severity, risk_score, time_to_anomaly_seconds, recommended_action, created_at FROM early_warnings WHERE $__timeFilter(created_at) AND namespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'kube-public', 'kube-node-lease', 'local-path-storage') AND (expires_at IS NULL OR expires_at > NOW()) AND (acknowledged IS NULL OR acknowledged = FALSE) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
